result.arabic_text: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ
result.translation: Maze bavuga bati: “Karashize ingani twemere abantu babiri basanzwe nkatwe, kandi abo barungitsweko muri Bene Israyeli ari abashumba bari musi y’amategeko yacu, kandi baca bugufi kuri twebwe!”.
